sentences.en: All combine to form a layer of mist to envelop this region.
sentences.cn: 织成一层烟雾又笼罩着这个地区.

sentences.en: But, a lot of people do not understand his pay envelop truly.
sentences.cn: 但是, 很多人并不真正了解自己的工资袋.

sentences.en: He never imagined the whirlwind that would envelop him.
sentences.cn: 他从没想到厄运来得这么快.

sentences.en: He steamed the valuable stamp off the envelop.
sentences.cn: 他用蒸汽熏揭下信封上的邮票.

sentences.en: I am looking for oil envelop, IF YOU ARE FACTORY, YOU CAN CONTACT US.
sentences.cn: 我们正在寻找汽车油封, 请厂家联系我们.

sentences.en: If the letter is right, stamp the answer on the envelop.
sentences.cn: 答案正确的信,答案是几, 用印章在信封上盖几个戳.

sentences.en: Keep and control the work order collection envelop.
sentences.cn: 保留并保管工作单收集信封.

sentences.en: Make sure the stamp is properly glued to the envelop.
sentences.cn: 一定要把邮票在信封上粘牢.

sentences.en: The papers are falling out of the envelop, push them back.
sentences.cn: 论文从封袋里掉出来了, 把它们放回原处.

sentences.en: They crowded the buses roamed the streets and seemed to envelop everything.
sentences.cn: 在公交车上、街道上,似乎每个角落都充斥着他们的身影.

sentences.en: They pushed the envelop of pop music and became the biggest band of the 20 th century.
sentences.cn: 他们不断革新流行乐界,因而成为20世纪最伟大的乐团.

sentences.en: This stamp won't stick to the envelop.
sentences.cn: 这张邮票在信封上贴不住.

sentences.en: Thomas crumpled the empty envelop and tossed it accurately into the wastebasket.
sentences.cn: 托马斯把空信封捏成一团,随手很准确地扔在废纸篓里.

sentences.en: To cover or envelop with or as if with fog.
sentences.cn: 以雾包围以或仿佛以雾气覆盖或包容.

sentences.en: Which include envelop generator, low - freq oscillator, envelop control, manual control, etc.
sentences.cn: 这些手段是包络发生器 、 低频振荡器 、 包络控制 、 手动控制等.

words.tran_cn: 信封，封皮；包膜；[天] 包层；包迹

trans.tran_en: to cover or wrap something or someone up completely
to cover or wrap something or someone up completely
